changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION_ID DEFAULT NEWID(), CSV_SOURCE_FILE NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, ROW_DATA NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, EXCEPTION_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION_EXCEPTION_TIME DEFAULT GETUTCDATE() INDEX IX_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION_EXCEPTION_TIME, WORKFLOW_ID NVARCHAR(64) CONSTRAINT DF_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION_WORKFLOW_ID DEFAULT NULL INDEX IX_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION_WORKFLOW_ID, CONSTRAINT PK_CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([ID]) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.CSV_STAGING_EXCEPTION
